channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for DE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for DE

item.title: Report E-2024030523
item.description:
Report E-2024030523

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-05T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-12
  • City: MILLSBORO
  • State: DE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: QUALITY CARRIERS, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: DURING UNLOADING OPERATIONS, THE DRIVER HOOKED TO THE CONSIGNEE BLOW DOWN PUMP. Blow DOWN PUMP MALFUCTIONED RESULTING IN RELEASE OF MATERIAL. DRIVER STOPPED OPERATIONS CORRECTED SITUATION COMPLETED UNLOADING WITH OUT ADDITIONAL INCIDENT. PLANT PERSONELL CLEANED THE SPILL.
